publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-651 Patricia Ferguson on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Business Motion-That the Parliament agrees- (a) that the Justice 1 Committee report to the Justice 2 Committee by 5 December 2003 on the Act of Sedurunt (Fees of Sheriff Officers) 2003 (SSI 2003/538); and (b) that Stage 2 of the Vulnerable Witnesses (Scotland) Bill be completed by 12 December 2003. Supported by: Tavish Scott*
